name: Dark Castle (itch)
description:
Glad to present you my game! It's isometric soulslike rpg! Game is currently in development but will soon be released on Steam! If you liked the demo, the best support would be a donation and  to show it to your friends. I am working on this project alone and I hope that it will be completed soon. Explore the castle with your little fairytale companion. learn all the secrets and overcome all bosses.

Contact with me: 13371337ddd@gmail.com

I am open to suggestions and advice.

Game update version 1.0. FIxed errosrs, added items, changed the map.Download Dark castle 1.0
